post:
"**AheadCloud NetWorks**" proudly present its **VPS Deals** on "**LowEndTalk**". At AheadCloud we aim to provide best quality and customer satisfaction is our primary concern.

Our customers include video/audio streaming providers, filehosts, developers etc.If you have any special needs for your project feel free to reach our team @ s**ales@aheadcloud.com**. We will ensure you will have the best hosting experience with us.

**Why you should choose AheadCloud NetWorks services:**

+Server setup within minutes.

+No long term commitments – Flexible month-to-month terms

+Support for large no of linux distribution.

+Unlimited self reboot,reinstall,bandwidth graphs.

+Strictly no overselling upto 20% resources are reserved to cope with spike and unexpected demands.

**US Kansas City VPS**: ( Coupons at bottom :) )

**ACN/USKC/1G** :

    Virtualization - OpenVz
    Processor - 4Cores
     RAM - 1GB Dedicated (+512MB vSwap)
    HDD - 60GB (RAID Protected)
    Bandwidth - 1TB @ 100Mbps port speed
    Location - US KC
    Quantity - Limited
    Price - 3$/Month or 30$/Year(i.e. 2.5$/Month for yearly payments)
    Order - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=16

Coupons:

**For Both Location  1GB VPS**

**HALL40** - For Monthly Payment. (code is HALL40 not HAL40)

**LET301GY** - For Yearly Payment

**For Both Location 2GB VPS**

**GIVEME6** - 40% off on monthly payments.

**Order before all the stock is gone.**

Make sure to choose USD as currency while checkout or else you will be charged equivalent amount in Euro.

You will get Solusvm access after payment so that you can manage the VPS or perform installation of desired OS.

Payment Mode:

+Paypal

+Bitcoin(place order and contact support for payments)

+Indian Bank transfer(place order and contact support for payments)

If you have any query please drop us a mail.

Regards
